verses.name: Romans 11:11
verses.text: I say then, Have they stumbled that they should fall? God forbid: but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles, for to provoke them to jealousy.

verses.name: Romans 11:12
verses.text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world, and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles; how much more their fulness?

verses.name: Romans 11:13
verses.text: For I speak to you Gentiles, inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles, I magnify mine office:

verses.name: Romans 11:14
verses.text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh, and might save some of them.
